Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance and quality. I believe it could significantly enhance your capabilities or improve your lifestyle. Considering its value and benefits, I am offering it to you for $15000. I trust this investment will prove to be highly rewarding for you. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity a reality for you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
